mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scms_shoppingcart ( orderlistid, pid, number, itemstatus, addtime, orderid, id ) VALUES ( #{orderlistid}, #{pid}, #{number}, #{itemstatus}, #{addtime}, #{orderid}, #{id} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.pname,a.price,a.image,b.number FROM pms_product a LEFT JOIN scms_shoppingcart b ON a.pid=b.pid WHERE b.id=#{id}
